alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 6:42PM EDT until June 08 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Lee County in central North Carolina... Wake County in central North Carolina... Central Johnston County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fuquay-Varina, or 11 miles south of Cary, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Smithfield, Lillington, Wake Forest, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Dunn and Zebulon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
